Class SAMLMetadataFilter

java.lang.Object
com.erudika.para.server.security.filters.SAMLMetadataFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Filter
public class SAMLMetadataFilter extends Object
A filter which returns the SAML metadata for a particular app.
Author:
Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]
